official_title: A bill to amend the Truth in Lending Act to impose a permanent ban on credit card surcharges.

summary.text: Amends the Truth in Lending Act to repeal the expiration date of the prohibition against credit card surcharges (thus making the prohibition permanent).

titles.title: A bill to amend the Truth in Lending Act to impose a permanent ban on credit card surcharges.
